shellshocker

Class EnemySprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • shellshocker.EnemySprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Boss, Enemy, SmartEnemy, Tower

    public abstract class EnemySprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements Location
    Creates enemy objects that have attributes of location, speed, and health. The enemies serve the purpose of impeding progress for the user-based character and can be destroyed.

      Constructor for creating the enemy object, which has attributes of location, activity, movement, and also rates at which to fire projectiles.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnemySprite

        public EnemySprite(int t,
           int x,
           int y,
           int xSpd,
           int ySpd,
           int l,
           int w,
           int h,
           boolean a,
           int time,
           int limit)
        Constructor for creating the enemy object, which has attributes of location, activity, movement, and also rates at which to fire projectiles.
        Parameters:
        t - The type of enemy.
        x - the x-coordinate of the enemy.
        y - the y-coordinate of the enemy.
        xSpd - the horizontal vector of the speed of the enemy.
        ySpd - the vertical vector of the speed of the enemy.
        l - the horizontal length of the enemy.
        w - the vertical width of the enemy.
        h - the health value of the enemy.
        a - the boolean which determines whether the enemy remains active or becomes inactive.
        time - the time count for the enemy.
        limit - the maximum health value of the enemy.
